entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
